Welcome back Julie.

Bonnie

>Okay, hi everyone,
>
>I am sorry I have missed the last two weeks. My modem was hit by
>lightening
>through the phone line and it took the company forever to finish it.
>Luckily, under warranty, but I lost a lot of computer time. I had sever
>withdraws...lol....I was unsure what to do with the extra time. Never fear
>I
>found tons to do. I just got it back last night. When I opened my e-mail
>at
>had exactly 1,000 messages, so needless to say, I had to hit the delete
>button alot.

> I am sorry I misses the passionate discussions. I have missed chatting

>
>Happy Mothering,
>Julie
>Mommy to Ali and Matthew, Wife to a Great Man, Adam
>Please check out a few of my favorite sites:
>http://www.mothering.com
>http://www.AttachmentParenting.org

>http://www.naturalchild.org
>"It helps me to remember that people are more important than ideas and that
>being kind is more important than being right."
>-Peggy O'Mara, Publisher of Mothering Magazine.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I am back
messages.msgSnippet: Okay, hi everyone, I am sorry I have missed the last two weeks.  My modem was hit by lightening through the phone line and it took the company forever to
messages.messageBody:
Okay, hi everyone,

I am sorry I have missed the last two weeks. My modem was hit by lightening
through the phone line and it took the company forever to finish it.
Luckily, under warranty, but I lost a lot of computer time. I had sever
withdraws...lol....I was unsure what to do with the extra time. Never fear I
found tons to do. I just got it back last night. When I opened my e-mail at
had exactly 1,000 messages, so needless to say, I had to hit the delete
button alot.

I am sorry I misses the passionate discussions. I have missed chatting
with you, all and I am thrilled to be back connected to the world and my
e-mail buddies.

Happy Mothering,
Julie
Mommy to Ali and Matthew, Wife to a Great Man, Adam
Please check out a few of my favorite sites:
http://www.mothering.com
http://www.AttachmentParenting.org
http://www.LaLecheLeague.org
http://www.naturalchild.org
"It helps me to remember that people are more important than ideas and that
being kind is more important than being right."
-Peggy O'Mara, Publisher of Mothering Magazine.
